page.title: 07RUBBISH? (CONT'D)
page.content: HASN'T BEEN EATEN OR HAS GONE OFF. CARDBOARD AND PAPER PACKAGING ARE USED TO MAKE PRODUCTS MORE ATTTRACTIVE AND TO CATCH YOUR EYE SO YOU WILL BUY THEM. THIS IS UNECESSARY RUBBISH AND WASTES OUR NATURAL RESOURCES. IN YEARS TO COME PEOPLE MAY DISCOVER THE RUBBISH TIP AND FIND TINS WITH PICTURES OF PEAS ON THE LABEL AND WILL REALISE THAT WE ATE PEAS I WONDER IF, WHEN FINDING A TIN OF DOG FOOD (FOOD WHICH WE FEED TO OUR PET DOGS) THEY WILL THINK THAT WE ATE DOGS. THERE ARE OTHER KINDS OF RUBBISH BESIDES HOUSEHOLD RUBBISH. INDUSTRIAL WASTE COMES FROM FACTORIES AND HAS TO BE DISPOSED OF VERY CAREFULLY. OLD CARS OLD FRIDGES, DISHWASHERS AND BEDS OFTEN END UP ON THE RUBBISH TIP.PERHAPS IN THE FUTURE ALL RUBBISH WILL BE RECYCLED IN ORDER TO SAVE THE WORLDS NATURAL RESOURCES BEFORE ITS TOO LATE.
